name: Trinket Terminal
description:
Trinket Terminal

In this vaporwave styled 3D arcade game, you must battle waves of enemies and survive for as long as possible. You are equipped with a ray-gun and special capsules that contain compressed trinkets which you can release on enemies to crush them and use to put up cover from incoming fire. 

Created for the UCI VGDC Quarter-Long Winter Project.

Controls

[WASD] - Movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Left Click - Shoot

Right-Click - Throw trinket. Click again to release it

E - Retract a trinket when looking at it

Escape - Pause / Adjust the game sensitivity

Team Members

Nathan Lacsamana - Project Lead, Production, Design, Programming

Darius Friedhof - Programming

Alice Hua - Programming, Art

Tim Kashani - Audio, Art, UI/UX, Programming

Zoi Meaders - Art, UI/UX, Design, Programming
